comments:

org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.dialogs.FilteredList.LabelComparator. Taking the 
previous version source makes everything work again.

Thanks for naming the specific package which produces the error... I will 
hopefully be able to reproduce it now.
I mark this bug as duplicate of 6385.
